product_name: Thule Specialty Railing Rack with 50" Load Bars
long_description: These specialty feet and bars are designed for the flush mount factory-installed side rails on the Subaru Forester (2003-2008) and Legacy Wagon. Integrated handles ensure fast installation to vehicle side rails. Easy-to-use foot and bar design; no tools required for installation. Four feet and two rapid square bars included. Vehicle protection and custom fit provided by SR kit (rubber adapters), sold separately. Please note: In order for Railing Rack to be used, the proper SR Kit must be purchased. Weight: 16 lbs.
short_description: These specialty feet and bars are designed for the flush mount factory-installed side rails on the Subaru Forester (2003-2008) and Legacy Wagon.
